extendedInfo.description: âââââââââââââââââââââââ Currently on Sale! 50% Off, Don't miss it! âââââââââââââââââââââââ The first use of Tanks in combat was by the British Army in 1916 during the Battle of the Somme. The name "Tank" was adopted in the UK during the early stages of their development, as a security measure to conceal their purpose. Nowadays tanks are widely used in the battlefields by various countries and troops.Military Tanks Encyclopedia is an application containing detailed information of over 530 types of Tanks and military vehicles. These Tanks and Military Vehicles are separated into 60 different categories according to their purposes and characteristics. It is probably the most complete and comprehensive Tank encyclopedia available in the App Market. This App is an excellent app for tank maniacs or for those who are interested in military. For each type of vehicles, the following information is included for easier reference where applicable:- A Photo of the vehicle- Name of the vehicle- Type it belongs to- Place of origin- Manufacturer- Number built- Specification (weight/height/width/weight)- Number of crew- Armor- Armament- Elevation- Traverse angle- Rate of fire- Max range- Engine- Horse power- Suspension- Operational range- Speed- Very detailed descriptionsThe application is optimized for all Android devices running on OS 1.5 or above.âââââââââââââââââââââââ WHAT YOU WILL EXPECT This application has the following features: - 2-Level Category Views with THUMBNAIL preview of each item- All Category View to preview all items in alphabetical order- Single Category View to list items of the same category- Ability to BOOKMARK selected items for easier reference- A tank name SEARCH engine- OFFLINE browsing âââââââââââââââââââââââ This application is proudly presented by ColaKey LLC.
